snippet: Frustrated Australia number one Bernard Tomic questioned team mate Nick Kyrgios's withdrawal from the Davis Cup tie against the United States in Melbourne after the hosts crashed out of the tournament's first round on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Frustrated Australia number one Bernard Tomic questioned team mate Nick Kyrgios's withdrawal from the Davis Cup tie against the United States in Melbourne after the hosts crashed out of the tournament's first round on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Beaten Tomic Tees Off at Absent Davis Cup Team Mate Kyrgios
headline.main: Beaten Tomic Tees Off at Absent Davis Cup Team Mate Kyrgios
